message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about $110? That's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
